review: We had a Chromecast until it broke. So when I saw the promotion for the Fire TV stick I pre-ordered it for $19. It originally appeared that Amazon was going to ship it in late November. We didn't get it until December 19th.  In the day or so we have had it I must say it we are thoroughly impressed. This widget has much more content versatility and reliability than the Chromecast. Taking into account the great discounted price I would give it 5 stars. However having to wait almost 2 months to receive it drops it down to 4 stars.
